result:
#app
    font-family: 'Microsoft JhengHei', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
html
    text-align: center
    color: #eee
h1, p
    color: #FFF
h1
    padding-top: 100px

.router-link-active, .router-link
    text-decoration: none


#myMenu
    position: absolute
    left: 5%
    top: 5%
    width: 50px
    height: 50px
    margin: 0
    transition: 0.6s
    cursor: pointer
    &:hover
        box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.6), 4px 4px 6px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4), 6px 6px 12px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4)


.menuBar1, .menuBar2, .menuBar3
    width: 35px
    height: 3px
    background-color: white
    transition: 0.3s
    margin: 6px 0
    position: relative
    left: 8px
    top: 8px
    border-radius: 15%

.home
    height: 40px
    width: 100px
    line-height: 30px
    text-align: center
    padding: 5px
    border: 1px solid white
    position: absolute
    right: 10%
    bottom: 10%
    transition: 0.6s
    cursor: pointer
    font-size: 20px
    font-style: bold
    &:hover
        background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)
.page-enter-active, .page-leave-active
    transition: 0.6s

.page-enter, .page-leave-to
    opacity: 0


// a
//     display: block
//     text-decoration: none
//     font-size: 120%
//     color: #FFF

sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
v-app(:style="{backgroundColor: '#333333'}")
    transition(name="page" mode="out-in")
        router-view(:key='$route.path')
    #myMenu(@click.stop='drawer = !drawer' :style="{'background-color':color.but}")
        .menuBar1
        .menuBar2
        .menuBar3
    v-navigation-drawer(v-model='drawer' absolute='' bottom='' temporary='' :style='{backgroundColor: color.but}')
        v-list(nav='' dense='')
            v-list-item-group(v-model='group' active-class='white--text text--accent-4')
                v-list-item(v-for='item in menuItems' :key='item.title')
                    v-list-item-title(@click="dakaPage=false")
                        router-link(:to='item.link' :style="{color: '#FFF'}" ) {{item.title}}
    .home
        router-link(to='/' :style="{color: '#FFF'}") HOME

</template>


<script>
import daka from './components/daka';

export default {
    components: {
        daka
    },
    data() {
        return {
            drawer: false,
            group: null,
            dakaPage: true,
            menuItems: [
                {title: "加班申請",link: '/OTsubmmit'},
                {title: "休假申請",link: '/leave/Picker'},
                {title: "打卡紀錄",link: '/recording'},
                {title: "補休累計時數",link: '/compensatoryTime'},
                {title: "職務代理人設定",link: '/agent'}
                ],
            color: {
                bgc: "#333333",
                but: "#A78E70"
            }
        }        
    },
    watch: {
        group () {
            this.drawer = false
        }
    },

    
    methods: {
        updateCurrentTime() {
            var moment = require('moment'); 
            moment().format();
            this.currentTime = moment().format('HH:mm:ss');
            this.date = moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD ddd")
        },
        buttontr () {


        }

    },

    created() {
        setInterval(() => this.updateCurrentTime(), 1 * 1000);
    }
}       
</script>

<style lang="sass">
#app
    font-family: 'Microsoft JhengHei', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
html
    text-align: center
    color: #eee
h1, p
    color: #FFF
h1
    padding-top: 100px

.router-link-active, .router-link
    text-decoration: none


#myMenu
    position: absolute
    left: 5%
    top: 5%
    width: 50px
    height: 50px
    margin: 0
    transition: 0.6s
    cursor: pointer
    &:hover
        box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.6), 4px 4px 6px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4), 6px 6px 12px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4)


.menuBar1, .menuBar2, .menuBar3
    width: 35px
    height: 3px
    background-color: white
    transition: 0.3s
    margin: 6px 0
    position: relative
    left: 8px
    top: 8px
    border-radius: 15%

.home
    height: 40px
    width: 100px
    line-height: 30px
    text-align: center
    padding: 5px
    border: 1px solid white
    position: absolute
    right: 10%
    bottom: 10%
    transition: 0.6s
    cursor: pointer
    font-size: 20px
    font-style: bold
    &:hover
        background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)
.page-enter-active, .page-leave-active
    transition: 0.6s

.page-enter, .page-leave-to
    opacity: 0


// a
//     display: block
//     text-decoration: none
//     font-size: 120%
//     color: #FFF

</style>
